fields.name: Scoping
fields.description: The scope of the request is being determined

fields.name: Assigned to Program
fields.description: Request had been assigned to a program by reception

fields.name: Rejected by Program
fields.description: The request was rejected by the assigned program

fields.name: Assigned to Lab
fields.description: Request had been assigned to a lab by a program

fields.name: Reassignment Requested
fields.description: The assigned lab would like the request to be reassigned

fields.name: Assigned to Expert
fields.description: Request had been assigned to an expert by a lab

fields.name: Providing TA
fields.description: Expert is currently providing technical assistance to the customer

fields.name: Close out
fields.description: Expert is providing close out information

fields.name: Completed
fields.description: Technical assistance assiciated with the request has been fulfilled

fields.name: Unable to address
fields.description: Request was not able to be serviced by any available program.

fields.name: Closeout Completed
fields.description: Closeout forms have been completed by an expert and are ready for review
